pr_title: [BEAM-10895] Support UNNEST an (possibly nested) array field of an struct column

timeline.message: Support UNNEST an (possibly nested) array field of an struct column

timeline.bodyText: So it looks like guaranteed to have nested row except for the last index? If not better to add validation here.
timeline.author: amaliujia

replies.bodyText: I believe the updated code in BeamUnnestRule.java will guarantee this.
replies.author: robinyqiu
